= General =

= Baseline =
	1. The 1998 DTM is contoured at 1998 MHW (0.308m NAVD88 GEOID12b)
	2. The shoreline is smoothed
		- sliding_window
			* look-ahead = 241
			* threshold = 0
	3. The shoreline is reduced
		- Douglas-Peucker Reduction
			* reduction = 100%
			* threshold = 20

= Transects =
	1. Shore normal transects are placed every 50m
		1. They vary from 350m - 500m depending on the section of coastline
